test_cases.name: test_enter_source_destination
test_cases.description: Verify user can enter source and destination
test_cases.code:
```python
import pytest

class TestBusTickets:
    
    def test_enter_source_destination(self, MobileApp):
        """Verify user can enter source and destination"""
        # Enter source
        MobileApp.enter_source('Mumbai')
        # Enter destination
        MobileApp.enter_destination('Pune')
        assert MobileApp.is_source_entered('Mumbai') and MobileApp.is_destination_entered('Pune'), 'Source and destination should be entered'
    
```

test_cases.name: test_select_journey_date
test_cases.description: Verify user can select journey date
test_cases.code:
```python
import pytest

class TestBusTickets:
    
    def test_select_journey_date(self, MobileApp):
        """Verify user can select journey date"""
        MobileApp.select_journey_date('Sat, 7 Sep')
        assert MobileApp.is_date_selected('Sat, 7 Sep'), 'Date should be selected'
    
```

test_cases.name: test_search_button_click
test_cases.code:
```python
import pytest

class TestBusTickets:
    
    def test_search_button_click(self, MobileApp):
        """Verify search button functionality"""
        MobileApp.enter_source('Mumbai')
        MobileApp.enter_destination('Pune')
        MobileApp.select_journey_date('Sat, 7 Sep')
        MobileApp.tap_search_button()
        assert MobileApp.is_bus_list_displayed(), 'Bus list should be displayed after search'
    
```

test_cases.name: test_date_selection_today
test_cases.description: Verify date selection functionality with TODAY option
test_cases.code:
```python
import pytest

class TestBusTickets:
    
    def test_date_selection_today(self, MobileApp):
        """Verify date selection functionality with TODAY option"""
        MobileApp.tap_date_field()
        assert MobileApp.is_quick_date_option_visible('TODAY'), 'TODAY option should be visible'
        MobileApp.select_quick_date_option('TODAY')
        today_date = MobileApp.get_selected_date()
        assert today_date == MobileApp.get_current_date(), 'Selected date should be today'
    
```

test_cases.name: test_date_selection_tomorrow
test_cases.description: Verify date selection functionality with TOMORROW option
test_cases.code:
```python
import pytest

class TestBusTickets:
    
    def test_date_selection_tomorrow(self, MobileApp):
        """Verify date selection functionality with TOMORROW option"""
        MobileApp.tap_date_field()
        assert MobileApp.is_quick_date_option_visible('TOMORROW'), 'TOMORROW option should be visible'
        MobileApp.select_quick_date_option('TOMORROW')
        tomorrow_date = MobileApp.get_selected_date()
        assert tomorrow_date == MobileApp.get_tomorrow_date(), 'Selected date should be tomorrow'
    
```
